name: Protect The Pumpkin (LittleBeardMan)
description:
My Submission for GBJam 10, using the theme "Plant".

This is a simple tower defense game where you must plant and water seeds to grow your turrets. Protect farmer Pete's prized pumpkin from waves of bugs while also making sure your plants are watered and happy.

There is an in-game tutorial that explains the mechanics. After you've completed the tutorial you can look at the "Help" screen in the pause menu to see what each tool/plant does. You can also replay the tutorial by toggling the "Tutorial" setting in the options menu to "ON".

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Change selection and move character

Z Key - Confirm selection or use your equipped tool

X Key - Hold to bring up your tool wheel and select a tool with the arrow keys

Enter - Pause and un-pause
